comments: Dr. Smith is a good lab instructor. Quizzes/ reports not dropped in CHEM 102 tho. She wants u to come to lab on time and make sure u read the lab before coming or u will be lost more often. It\'s also good to do the lab report right after the lab or u will find yourself struggling the night before the next lab, not to mention pre- proceedure+ quiz

comments: Had her for chem102 lab in the spring. She grades pretty seriously. She requires you write page long pre-labs before the lab, and if you forget it, she kicks you out. Her lab reports are anywhere between 3-6 pages (most of it is calculations though) and its worth 10-20 points If you do take her, dont do the pre-lab questions. Not on any quiz/exams

comments: Avoid this teacher for Lab if possible. She is so stickler for the rules and cars more about that then the class; She will not flex in any way. She is constantly scanning the room and disrupting the class yelling "No phones people!" The content isn\'t difficult, but she will destroy your grade and deduct points for every tiny detail.

comments: Dr. Smith is a fantastic Lab teacher. She lets you know exactly what she wants to see in your lab reports and grades very fairly! Asking for help is easy, she is so willing to help with anything lab OR lecture related. Don\'t expect her to wiggle on the departments policies, very strict in that regard.
